Publication Title: Matrisome AnalyzeR - a suite of tools to annotate and quantify ECM molecules in big datasets across organisms
Publication Keywords: Extracellular matrix, Bioinformatics, Omics, Data Annotation, Model Organisms
Publication Authors: Petar B Petrov, James M Considine, Valerio Izzi, Alexandra Naba
Publication Abstract: The extracellular matrix (ECM) is a complex meshwork of proteins that forms the scaffold of all tissues in multicellular organisms. It plays crucial roles in all aspects of life - from orchestrating cell migration during development, to supporting tissue repair.
